00002  * \file RandomTime.cpp
00003  * \brief Timing %RandomLib
00004  *
00005  * Compile/link with, e.g.,\n
00006  * g++ -I../include -O2 -funroll-loops
00007  *   -o RandomTime RandomTime.cpp ../src/Random.cpp\n
00008  * ./RandomTime

00019 #include <iostream>
00020 #include <iomanip>

00023 #include <ctime>

00025 #include <sys/time.h>
00026 #else

00034 double HighPrecMult() {
00035 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00036   LARGE_INTEGER t;
00037   QueryPerformanceFrequency((LARGE_INTEGER *)&t);
00038   return 1.0/(t.HighPart*std::pow(2.0, 32) + t.LowPart);
00039 #else
00040   return 1.e-6;
00041 #endif
00042 }
00043 long long HighPrecTime() {
00044 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00045   LARGE_INTEGER t;
00046   QueryPerformanceCounter((LARGE_INTEGER *)&t);
00047   return (static_cast<long long>(t.HighPart) << 32) +
00048     static_cast<long long>(t.LowPart);
00049 #else
00050   timeval t;
00051   gettimeofday(&t, NULL);
00052   return static_cast<long long>(t.tv_sec) * 1000000LL +
00053     static_cast<long long>(t.tv_usec);
00054 #endif
00055 }
00056 
00057 // estime is the estimated time for the command in ns.  The command is executed
00058 // as many time as necessary to fill a second.
00059 
00060 #define TIME(expr,esttime) {                                            \
00061     long long t1, t2;                                                   \
00062     long long c1 = r.Count();                                           \
00063     size_t m = int(1.e9/esttime+1);                                     \
00064     t1=HighPrecTime();                                                  \
00065     for (size_t j = m; j; --j) { expr; }                                \
00066     t2=HighPrecTime();                                                  \
00067     std::cout << std::setprecision(1) << std::setw(8) << std::scientific \
00068               << 0.1*floor((t2-t1)*HighPrecMult()*1.0e10/m+0.5) << "ns "; \
00069     std::string cmd(#expr);                                             \
00070     std::string::size_type p;                                           \
00071     p = cmd.find("template ");                                          \
00072     if (p != std::string::npos) cmd = cmd.substr(0,p) + cmd.substr(p+9); \
00073     p = cmd.find(" = ");                                                \
00074     if (p != std::string::npos) cmd = cmd.substr(p + 3);                \
00075     p = cmd.find("Random::");                                           \
00076     if (p != std::string::npos) cmd = cmd.substr(0,p)+cmd.substr(p+8);  \
00077     p = cmd.find("std::");                                              \
00078     if (p != std::string::npos) cmd = cmd.substr(0,p)+cmd.substr(p+5);  \
00079     if (cmd[0] == '(')                                                  \
00080       cmd = cmd.substr(1,cmd.size()-2);                                 \
00081     std::cout << std::setprecision(1) << std::setw(5) << std::fixed     \
00082               << (r.Count()-c1)/float(m) << "rv" << " per " << cmd << "\n"; \
00083   }
00084 
00085 template<typename Random>
00086 void Time(Random& r) {
00087 
00088   volatile bool b = false;
00089   volatile unsigned i = 0, n = 0;
00090   volatile typename Random::result_type ii = 0;
00091   volatile unsigned long long l = 0;
00092   volatile float f = 0;
00093   volatile double d = 0;
00094   std::vector<unsigned long> v;
00095 
00096   ii = r();
00097   if (ii == 0) n = 1;
00098 
00099   std::cout << "Using " << r.Name() << " with seed "
00100        << r.SeedString() << "\n";
00101 
00102   std::cout << "Time system random number generator\n";
00103   TIME(i = rand(),                                   1.0e+01);
00104 
00105   std::cout << "Time generation of integer results\n";
00106   TIME(ii = r(),                                     2.0e+00);
00107   TIME(i = r.template Integer<unsigned>(),           2.6e+00);
00108   TIME(l = r.template Integer<unsigned long long>(), 4.3e+00);
00109   TIME(i = (r.template Integer<unsigned,6>()),       2.6e+00);
00110   TIME(i = r.template Integer<unsigned>(52u),        5.6e+00);
00111   TIME(i = r.template Integer<unsigned>(52u+n),      1.3e+01);
00112 
00113   std::cout << "Time generation of real results\n";
00114   TIME(f = r.template Fixed<float>(),                4.9e+00);
00115   TIME(d = r.template Fixed<double>(),               9.5e+00);
00116   TIME(f = r.template Float<float>(),                1.9e+01);
00117   TIME(d = r.template Float<double>(),               1.8e+01);
00118 
00119   std::cout << "Time generation of boolean results\n";
00120   TIME(b = r.template Prob<float>(0.28f),            1.1e+01);
00121   TIME(b = r.template Prob<double>(0.28),            7.7e+00);
00122 
00123   std::cout << "Time generation of normal distribution\n";
00124   RandomLib::NormalDistribution<float> nf;
00125   RandomLib::NormalDistribution<double> nd;
00126   TIME(f = nf(r),                                    4.1e+01);
00127   TIME(d = nd(r),                                    5.4e+01);
00128 
00129   std::cout << "Time returning starting seeds\n";
00130   TIME(i = Random::SeedWord(),                       1.1e+06);
00131   TIME(v = Random::SeedVector(),                     1.9e+04);
00132 
00133   r.Reset();
00134   std::cout << "Time getting the ready for first random result\n";
00135   TIME((r.Reset(), r.SetCount(0)),                   6.9e+03);
00136 
00137   r.SetCount(123);
00138   std::cout << "Time stepping the generator forward and back\n";
00139   TIME(r.StepCount(10000),                           6.3e+03);
00140   TIME(r.StepCount(-10000),                          1.1e+04);
00141 
00142   std::cout << "Time sampling from a discrete distribution\n";
00143   // Weights for throwing a pair of dice
00144   unsigned w[] = { 0, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1 };
00145   RandomLib::RandomSelect<float> seld(w, w+13);
00146   TIME(i = seld(r),                                  2.8e+01);
00147   std::vector<int> a(101);
00148   for (int m = 0; m < 101; ++m) a[m] = m;
00149 
00150   std::cout << "Time shuffling 100 numbers\n";
00151   TIME(std::random_shuffle(a.begin(), a.end(), r),   1.3e+03);
00152 
00153   r.SetStride(10);
00154   std::cout << "Time with stride = 10\n";
00155   TIME(ii = r(),                                     1.0e+01);
00156   TIME(d = nd(r),                                    8.7e+01);
00157 
00158   r.SetStride(100);
00159   std::cout << "Time with stride = 100\n";
00160   TIME(ii = r(),                                     6.8e+01);
00161   TIME(d = nd(r),                                    4.1e+02);
00162 
00163   r.SetStride();
00164   // Avoid warning about set but unused variables
00165   if (b && i == 0 && l == 0 && f == 0 && d == 0)
00166     r.StepCount(0);
00167   return;
00168 }
00169 
00170 int main(int, char**) {
00171   try {
00172     {
00173       typedef RandomLib::SRandom32 R;
00174       R::SelfTest();
00175       R r;
00176       r.StepCount(123);
00177       Time<R>(r);
00178     }
00179     {
00180       typedef RandomLib::SRandom64 R;
00181       R::SelfTest();
00182       R r;
00183       r.StepCount(123);
00184       Time<R>(r);
00185     }
00186     if (false) {
00187       // Skip timing MRandom{32,64}
00188       {
00189         typedef RandomLib::MRandom32 R;
00190         R::SelfTest();
00191         R r;
00192         r.StepCount(123);
00193         Time<R>(r);
00194       }
00195       {
00196         typedef RandomLib::MRandom64 R;
00197         R::SelfTest();
00198         R r;
00199         r.StepCount(123);
00200         Time<R>(r);
00201       }
00202     }
00203     return 0;
00204   }
00205   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00206     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00207     return 1;
00208   }
00209   catch (...) {
00210     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00211     return 1;
00212   }
00213 }
